name: Sniper Strike Shooting 3D
description: Enjoy the biggest unique real Sniper Strike Shooting 3D game. Become a sniper; enter to the city to kill the dangerous enemies with test your best sniper skills and show your real assassination experience. Sniper Strike Shooting 3D is here for your great enjoyment time with Lots of astounding and action levels with stunning graphics and thrilling environments; you can also feel effective sound of weapon shooting in this addictive simulation. This sniper shooting simulation is full action base addicting game and it’s absolutely free. You will enjoy real 3D environment of city adventure enemies.
